text: Bo ab'ekika kya Thamud twabatumira Muganda waabwe Swaleh, naagamba nti abange bantu bange musinze Katonda temulinaayo kintu kyonna kigwanidde kusinzibwa okugyako yye, yye yeeyabatandikawo ngâ€™abaggya mu nsi, ate naabakwasa obuyinza okugikulaakulanya, kale mumwegayirire, era mwenenye, mudde gyali mazima Mukama omulabirizi wange ali kumpi ayanukula (abamusaba)
